item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1013 points | 252 comments)
2. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (307 points | 82 comments)
3. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (185 points | 67 comments)
4. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (162 points | 35 comments)
5. Averaging is a convenient fiction of neuroscience (52 points | 30 comments)
6. The Death of LCDs, Means New Life for Chips (18 points | 8 comments)
7. Inside a Ferroelectric RAM Chip (64 points | 26 comments)
8. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (146 points | 66 comments)
9. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (144 points | 24 comments)
10. Launch HN: Panora (YC S24) – Data Integration API for LLMs (54 points | 10 comments)
11. Major Toronto Utility Company Stores Customers' Passwords in Plain Text (88 points | 56 comments)
12. Bill limits smartphone use in California schools (7 points | 2 comments)
13. Picking Glibc Versions at Runtime (36 points | 4 comments)
14. Crypto scammers hack OpenAI's press account on X (46 points | 23 comments)
15. GPU Puzzles (324 points | 32 comments)
16. WP Engine sent "cease and desist" letter to Automattic (17 points | 10 comments)
17. Alan Turing's 1950 manual for the Mark I electronic computer [pdf] (172 points | 43 comments)
18. Developing a go bot embedding ichiban Prolog (42 points | 4 comments)
19. Cache Me Not, Cache Me, Cache Me Not (4 points | discuss)
20. Show HN: Media Hoarder v1.4.0 Supporting TV Series, Introducing Episode Heatmaps (99 points | 46 comments)
21. Brainfuck Enterprise Solutions (535 points | 133 comments)
22. Smart Goose Deterrent System (78 points | 35 comments)
23. Scientists Propose Groundbreaking Method to Detect Single Gravitons (11 points | 4 comments)
24. Telegram Removes Z-Library Posts 'Due to Copyright Infringement' (24 points | 6 comments)
25. Overview of cross-architecture portability problems (75 points | 11 comments)
26. The Many Lives of James Lovelock (32 points | 4 comments)
27. Show HN: Time Flies (362 points | 36 comments)
28. Cloudflare's new marketplace lets websites charge AI bots for scraping (339 points | 227 comments)
29. NeRF-Supervised Feature Point Detection and Description (36 points | 1 comment)
30. Dot (YC S21) Is Hiring an Engineer to Automate Analytics (Remote) ( | hide)
